Server

Class ProfessorThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.ProfessorThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constants

    public class ProfessorThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants
    Professor thread runs the server operations for the professor client. Client sends a operation which acts as a command for the thread to execute the proper method to communicate with the database and client.
    Author:
    Justin, Magnus, Robert

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface Data.Constants

        ACTIVATE_ASSIGN, ACTIVATE_COURSE, ALL_STUDENTS, CREATE_COURSE, DEACTIVATE_ASSIGN, DEACTIVATE_COURSE, DOWNLOAD_ASSIGN, DOWNLOAD_SUB, ENROLL_STUDENT, EXIT, GET_ASSIGN, GET_GRADES, GET_SUBMISSIONS, GRADE_SUBMISSON, PROF_COURSES, PROFESSOR, SEARCH_STUDENT_ID, SEARCH_STUDENT_LASTNAME, SEND_EMAIL, STUDENT, STUDENT_COURSES, SUBMIT_ASSIGN, UNENROLL_STUDENT, UPLOAD_ASSIGN

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProfessorThread(java.io.BufferedReader sIn, java.io.PrintWriter sOut, java.io.ObjectOutputStream oOut, java.io.ObjectInputStream oIn, DatabaseHelper data)
      Constructs thread with socket connections to the client along with the database

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activateAssignment()
      Activate the assignment by updating the active field in the database for the selected assignment on the client side
      void activateCourse()
      activate the course by updating the active field in the database for the selected course on the client side
      void createCourse()
      creates a course by reading the course from the client and inserting it into the database.
      void deactivateAssignment()
      Deactivate the assignment by updating the active field in the database for the selected assignment on the client side
      void deactivateCourse()
      deactivate the course by updating the active field in the database for the selected course on the client side
      void downloadSubmission()
      Sends a submission file to the client by reading the selected submission from the client and retrieving the file linked to the submission path in the database.
      void enrollStudent()
      Enroll student in class by reading student enrollment from client and inserting the enrollment into the database.
      void exitThread()
      Closes all input and output streams and sets checkEnd to true so that the run method can exit loop.
      void getAll()
      sends a list of all students enrolled in a course to client by reading the course from the client and constructing an arraylist of students in the course for sending.
      void getAssignments()
      Access assignments in database and send all assignments in the database to the client as an arrayList.
      void getProfessorCourses()
      sends all the courses in the database to the professor client model
      void getSubmissions()
      Gets an arraylist of submissions that match the assignment id that is read from the client.
      void gradeSubmission()
      Updates the grade and comment section in the database of a submission with comments and grade from the client
      void readOperation()
      Reads the connection with a series of if statements to execute the proper method for the operation.
      void run()
      run the thread by continuously reading the operations being sent from the client and executing the operation in readOperation().
      void searchStudentId()
      reads current course from client and searches all the students in the course and sends if back to the client as an arraylist
      void searchStudentLastName()
      reads current course from client and searches all the students in the course and sends if back to the client as an arraylist
      void sendEmail()
      Sends a email to all the students in the class by reading the email body from the client and calling the email helper to send the email.
      void unenrollStudent()
      Unenroll student in class by reading student enrollment from client and deleting the enrollment from the database.
      void uploadAssign()
      Upload an assignment onto the server by receiving the file from the client and saving the file contents into the assignments file path specified in the project folder.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        run the thread by continuously reading the operations being sent from the client and executing the operation in readOperation(). Loop exits if client closes connection.

      • readOperation

        public void readOperation()
        Reads the connection with a series of if statements to execute the proper method for the operation.

      • getProfessorCourses

        public void getProfessorCourses()
        sends all the courses in the database to the professor client model

      • createCourse

        public void createCourse()
        creates a course by reading the course from the client and inserting it into the database.

      • activateCourse

        public void activateCourse()
        activate the course by updating the active field in the database for the selected course on the client side

      • deactivateCourse

        public void deactivateCourse()
        deactivate the course by updating the active field in the database for the selected course on the client side

      • searchStudentId

        public void searchStudentId()
        reads current course from client and searches all the students in the course and sends if back to the client as an arraylist

      • searchStudentLastName

        public void searchStudentLastName()
        reads current course from client and searches all the students in the course and sends if back to the client as an arraylist

      • enrollStudent

        public void enrollStudent()
        Enroll student in class by reading student enrollment from client and inserting the enrollment into the database. Sends an updated student list with the enrollment back to the client for displaying

      • unenrollStudent

        public void unenrollStudent()
        Unenroll student in class by reading student enrollment from client and deleting the enrollment from the database. Sends an updated student list with the enrollment back to the client for displaying

      • getAssignments

        public void getAssignments()
        Access assignments in database and send all assignments in the database to the client as an arrayList.

      • gradeSubmission

        public void gradeSubmission()
        Updates the grade and comment section in the database of a submission with comments and grade from the client

      • getSubmissions

        public void getSubmissions()
        Gets an arraylist of submissions that match the assignment id that is read from the client. The submission list is sent to the clinet for displaying.

      • activateAssignment

        public void activateAssignment()
        Activate the assignment by updating the active field in the database for the selected assignment on the client side

      • deactivateAssignment

        public void deactivateAssignment()
        Deactivate the assignment by updating the active field in the database for the selected assignment on the client side

      • uploadAssign

        public void uploadAssign()
        Upload an assignment onto the server by receiving the file from the client and saving the file contents into the assignments file path specified in the project folder. Assignment information is added to the database.

      • downloadSubmission

        public void downloadSubmission()
        Sends a submission file to the client by reading the selected submission from the client and retrieving the file linked to the submission path in the database.

      • sendEmail

        public void sendEmail()
        Sends a email to all the students in the class by reading the email body from the client and calling the email helper to send the email.

      • getAll

        public void getAll()
        sends a list of all students enrolled in a course to client by reading the course from the client and constructing an arraylist of students in the course for sending.

      • exitThread

        public void exitThread()
        Closes all input and output streams and sets checkEnd to true so that the run method can exit loop.
